title: Twitter users voted to oust Elon Musk in his recent poll. How did we get here?
description: Elon Musk’s ban on link sharing and his subsequent poll asking whether he should step down has been seized on by some who had previously welcomed him.

title: Twitter users vote for Elon Musk to step down as CEO in poll he launched
description: Twitter users voted overnight for Elon Musk to step down as the head of the social media platform, in a poll the billionaire launched himself on Sunday.
